overview: Honoring the Code of Conduct: a tale of domination and submission in the military. Follow super-hot Dean Spencer as he is locked up in solitary confinement, awaiting his dishonorable discharge. Stripped and shaved, he is forced to learn an entirely new way of life by Master Sargeant Jake Andrews. Also starring Falcon Exclusive Jeff Palmerâ€¦the adventure begins!
title: Stripped: The Code of Conduct
